metadata.title: CVE-2016-9646 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ikiwiki before 3.20161229 incorrectly called the CGI::FormBuilder->fieldmethod (similar to the CGI->param API that led to Bugzilla'sCVE-2014-1572), which can be abused to lead to commit metadata forgery.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
